tasks.description: Implement core functionality for: Implement a working vector database system using ChromaDB or a simple JSON-based vector store. Create scripts/vector_database.py with VectorDatabase class. Include methods for: storing task history, storing agent learnings, querying similar solutions, and retrieving past decisions. Make it lightweight and functional without external dependencies if ChromaDB isn't available.

Create comprehensive tests for the new feature: Implement a working vector database system using ChromaDB or a simple JSON-based vector store. Create scripts/vector_database.py with VectorDatabase class. Include methods for: storing task history, storing agent learnings, querying similar solutions, and retrieving past decisions. Make it lightweight and functional without external dependencies if ChromaDB isn't available.
